title: Powers and duties of successor personal
context: ยง560:3-716 Powers and duties of successor personal representative. A successor personal representative has the same power and duty as the original personal representative to complete the administration and distribution of the estate, as expeditiously as possible, but the successor personal representative shall not exercise any power expressly made personal to the executor named in the will. [L 1996, c 288, pt of ยง1]
